titleStmt.title: The vvaters of Marah sweetned. A thanks-giving sermon. Preached at Taunton, in the county of Somerset, May 11. 1647. for the gracious deliverance of that poore towne from the strait and bloody siege. / By T.B. Master of Arts, and a minister of the gospel in that county.
titleStmt.author: Batt, Timothy, 1613-1692.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Francis Eglesfield, and are to be sold by George Treagle in Taunton,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
